description: Complete autonomous analytics lab prompt set for DealershipAI/Hyper-AIV™ - all 10 prompt families for maximum accuracy, reduced latency, and predictive insights
author: DealershipAI Team

prompt_families.purpose: Ensure baseline data quality and prevent corrupted metrics
Maintain internal model stability and parameter tuning
Provide predictive and explanatory insights for dashboard
Enable financial decision making and ROI optimization
Adapt metrics to region-specific search ecosystems
Maintain data trust layer and detect anomalies
Optimize dashboard engagement and identify high-value features
Meta-optimize GPT performance and prompt accuracy
Enable portable, versioned prompt library deployment

monthly_cycle: 4. aiv_causal_summary → identify key drivers and recommendations

import_instructions: 1. Store all prompt files in /prompts/ directory
5. Each prompt becomes an executable cell with version control

expected_outcomes.autonomous_analytics: Fully automated data validation, model optimization, and insight generation
expected_outcomes.predictive_insights: 4-week AIV forecasts with confidence intervals and trend classification
expected_outcomes.financial_optimization: ROI scenario modeling with payback period analysis
expected_outcomes.regional_adaptation: Location-specific weight optimization for global markets
expected_outcomes.trust_security: Automated fraud detection maintaining 95%+ data trust score
expected_outcomes.user_optimization: Dashboard engagement analytics driving UX improvements
expected_outcomes.version_control: Portable, versioned prompt library for easy deployment
